data.actual_result: Upon first attempt Discord refreshes, every subsequent attempt to close doesn't do anything (Can't systematically reproduce this result unfortunately)
data.expected_result: Discord closes (It actually does this most of the time)
data.short_description: Discord occasionally won't close when Cmd+Q is pressed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Use Discord for some period of time - Press Cmd+Q - If Discord just refreshes rather than close Press Cmd+Q again
